channel.title: Website help [Paying]
channel.description: Paying .25-.50 for working answer. --- Hey guys, This is going to sound like a noob question, Which i'm sorry about. I'm pretty new too HTML, So I don't know very much about it. So here's the problem: I have a website for my RSPS, And a place that you can register on the forums. I added in a text box when you register, saying "In Game Name". That works and everything, but I want to be able to show it on the users profile. Because currently, if you enter your IGN in their, it does nothing. I would like to be able to see it in the users profile. --- Here is the coding for the text box I added: [code] In Game Name: [/code] So how would I make it add their IGN that they typed into that box come up onto their profile?

item.title: Website help [Paying]
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

[quote=“tyb97, post:2, topic:463615”]hey man u cnt pay fer help her k?

  1. There is a section of this forums for website development help, post this there.
  2. No paying for help, this is a free community.
  3. I’d help but I’m not much of a web developer, so try posting in the right section and see what you get![/quote]Oh, sorry. Only reason I was asking is because I really need the help quick. I didn’t know their was a web developmental forum. My bad.

Read full topic

item.title: Website help [Paying]
item.dc:creator: @TTSxClan TTSxClan
item.description:
@TTSxClan wrote:

Paying .25-.50 for working answer.

Hey guys, This is going to sound like a noob question, Which i’m sorry about. I’m pretty new too HTML, So I don’t know very much about it. So here’s the problem:

I have a website for my RSPS, And a place that you can register on the forums. I added in a text box when you register, saying “In Game Name”. That works and everything, but I want to be able to show it on the users profile. Because currently, if you enter your IGN in their, it does nothing. I would like to be able to see it in the users profile.

Here is the coding for the text box I added:

</tr> <td align="right" width="50%"> In Game Name: </td> <td align="left" width="50%"> <input id="username" name="username" autocomplete="off" maxlength="12"> </td>
So how would I make it add their IGN that they typed into that box come up onto their profile?

Read full topic
